front.title: Comparison of Internationalized Domain Name Proposals

abstract.t: The IDN Working Group is working on proposals for internationalizeddomain names that might become a standard in the IETF. Before a singlefull proposal can be made, competing proposals must be compared on awide range of requirements and desired features. This document comparesthe many parts of a comprehensive protocol that have been proposed. Itis the companion document to 'Requirements of Internationalized DomainNames' [IDN-REQ], which lays out the requirements for theinternationalized domain name protocol.
